verbs.description: Trump [V: could] make a half - baked Korean deal that increases dangers — but it 's less likely with such a hawk whispering in his ear .
[ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: make] [ARG1: a half - baked Korean deal that increases dangers] — but it 's less likely with such a hawk whispering in his ear .
Trump could make [ARG0: a half - baked Korean deal] [R-ARG0: that] [V: increases] [ARG1: dangers] — but it 's less likely with such a hawk whispering in his ear .
Trump could make a half - baked Korean deal that increases dangers — but [ARG1: it] [V: 's] [ARG2: less likely] [ARGM-ADV: with such a hawk whispering in his ear] .
